text: Haigazian University (; ) is a university in Beirut, Lebanon. It opened in 1955. It offers Bachelor's degrees in the Arts and Sciences, Business Administration and Economics. It also offers Master's degrees in the Arts, Sciences and Business Administration. The university is supported by the Armenian Evangelical Church. It was opened for the Armenian community in Lebanon. However, it is open to students of all nationalities. == Other websites == *Haigazian University website Category:Colleges and universities in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Lebanon Category:1955 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Lebanon Category:Organizations based in Lebanon
title: Haigazian University
